TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DurableTimerExtension extends System.Activities.Statements.TimerExtension implements class System.Activities.Hosting.IWorkflowInstanceExtension, class System.IDisposable
Public Class DurableTimerExtension Inherits TimerExtension Implements IDisposable, IWorkflowInstanceExtension
type DurableTimerExtension = class inherit TimerExtension interface IWorkflowInstanceExtension interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents an activity timer extension that can be persisted.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Activities.Statements.DurableTimerExtension> object can only be associated with a single workflow instance. If a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.DurableTimerExtension> object is used with more than one workflow instance, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown with the following message:
```Output This TimerExtension has already been attached to a workflow instance. ```

Docs.param: A time span object that is added to the timer registration table entry in a workflow operation along with callback information.
A point at which a workflow or activity can passively wait to be resumed following the expiration of a timer object.
Docs.summary: Adds a timer object that contains the specified time span and bookmark information to the table of registered timers for the current workflow operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Activities.Statements.DurableTimerExtension> object can only be associated with a single workflow instance. If a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.DurableTimerExtension> object is used with more than one workflow instance, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown with the following message:
```Output This TimerExtension has already been attached to a workflow instance. ```
